==Descriptions==
{{Description|The mighty wall defends against the searing sandstorms but has also blocked the spread of wisdom's blessing. Is divine wisdom not meant to shine on all people?|Viewpoint, [[The Frontier Beneath the High Wall]]}}

==Lore==
Caravan Ribat is a fortified village full of [[The Eremites|Eremites]] at the foot of the [[Wall of Samiel]], a wall which protects Sumeru's rainforests from the sandstorms. It is also the checkpoint between the forest and the desert which people traveling to and from [[Aaru Village]] or the Great Red Sand pass through.

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
*{{Lang|''{{w|Ribat}}''|ar=رِبَـاط}} is an Arabic term for a small fortification housing military volunteers on the frontier. These fortifications were later used as {{w|caravanserais}} (inn) to defend trade routes. Ribat in the abstract also refers to the voluntary defense of Islam.
